hero.title: Empower Your Tech Startup
hero.subtitle: AdTech fuels the growth of innovative startups in Jaffna and beyond through cutting-edge digital marketing solutions.

about.title: Empowering Tech Innovation in Jaffna & Beyond
about.description: At AdTech, we understand the unique challenges faced by tech startups, freelance developers, and software companies. Our mission is to bridge the gap between innovative technology and market success through strategic digital marketing.

techFirst.title: Tech-First Approach
techFirst.description: We speak your language and understand the technical complexities of your products.

localExpertise.title: Local Expertise
localExpertise.description: Deep understanding of the Sri Lankan tech ecosystem and regional market dynamics.

growthDriven.title: Growth-Driven
growthDriven.description: Every strategy is designed with scalability and sustainable growth in mind.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading digital marketing partner for tech startups across Sri Lanka, helping innovative companies transform their groundbreaking ideas into market leaders.

services.title: Marketing Services Built for Tech Companies
services.subtitle: Comprehensive digital marketing solutions designed specifically for the unique needs of tech startups, developers, and software companies.

seo.title: SEO & Technical SEO
seo.description: Optimize your tech products for search engines with advanced technical SEO strategies tailored for software companies.

content.title: Content Marketing
content.description: Create compelling technical content that resonates with developers, CTOs, and tech decision-makers.

social.title: Social Media Strategy
social.description: Build your tech brand presence on platforms where developers and tech leaders engage.

ads.title: Paid Advertising
ads.description: Targeted ad campaigns designed to reach tech professionals and potential enterprise clients.

leads.title: Lead Generation
leads.description: Generate high-quality leads from tech companies, startups, and enterprise clients.

consulting.title: Strategy Consulting
consulting.description: Comprehensive marketing strategy consulting specifically for tech startups and software companies.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing for Every Stage
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your startup's growth journey

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for early-stage startups and freelance developers in Sri Lanka

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: Ideal for scaling startups and growing software companies

scale.name: Scale
scale.description: Comprehensive solution for established tech companies

contact.title: Ready to Transform Your Tech Business?
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team of digital marketing experts. Let's discuss how we can accelerate your startup's growth.

footer.description: Empowering tech startups in Sri Lanka with strategic digital marketing solutions.
